job_title: Generative AI Technology Leader - HR Tech platform
job_description:
Generative AI Creative Technology Leader

Please note that we are looking for an exceptional GenAI leader who can help us build the future state of our platform as an AI first approach. Kindly apply only if you fit this need and have the necessary background. Thanks

Who are we

SimplifyHire is a leading global SAAS provider of talent solutions for contingent workforce and is one of the fastest growing extended workforce technology providers globally.

SimplifyHire is a very sophisticated multi-tenant SAAS HR Tech product built on a complex microservices architecture. Looking for a resource who has worked on sophisticated SAAS platforms or microservices products. Experience working with global teams would be a big plus. Our clients are large enterprise Fortune 500/Global 2000 companies and need complex engineering design to meet their expectations.

Role & Responsibilities

The Generative AI Technology Leader is responsible for strategizing, implementing, and overseeing the integration of GenAI technologies within our core HR Tech platform. This role combines technical expertise, leadership, and a deep understanding of HR Tech platforms. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, drive innovation, and leverage GenAI to enhance core HR platform including features like chatbot, job creation engine, workflow automation and co-pilot technology for recruitment.

Responsibilities:

GenAI Strategy and Roadmap:
• Develop a clear vision for GenAI adoption in HR.
• Create a roadmap for integrating GenAI into existing HR systems and processes.
• Identify high-impact use cases and prioritize implementation.

Technical Leadership:
• Stay abreast of the latest advancements in generative AI.
• Lead a team of data scientists, engineers, and AI specialists.
• Provide technical guidance on model selection, training, and deployment.

GenAI Implementation:
• Collaborate with HR leaders to identify areas where GenAI can add value.
• Oversee the development and deployment of GenAI models.
• Ensure seamless integration with existing HR tools and platforms.

HR Service Enhancement:
• Implement GenAI-powered chatbots for customer-facing interactions.
• Optimize HR platform service delivery by automating routine queries and tasks.
• Enhance employee experience through personalized, AI-driven interactions.

Recruitment Transformation:
• Work closely with recruiters to leverage GenAI for crafting compelling job descriptions.
• Generate insightful screening questions to improve candidate evaluations.
• Enhance talent acquisition processes through AI-driven insights.

Performance Metrics and Evaluation:
• Define success metrics for GenAI implementation.
• Monitor performance, analyze results, and iterate on models.
• Measure cost savings, productivity gains, and employee satisfaction.

Qualifications:
• Education: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, data science, or a related field.
• Experience:
• Proven track record in AI/ML projects, preferably in HR or related domains.
• Leadership experience in managing technical teams.
• Familiarity with NLP, GANs, VAEs, and other generative AI techniques.
• Skills:
• Strong programming skills (Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.).
• Strategic thinking and ability to align GenAI initiatives with business goals.
• Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.

Qualifications: Experience working with global teams would be a big plus

job_description:
Who You’ll Work With

As a modern technology company, our Slalom Technologists are disrupting the market and bringing to life the art of the possible for our clients. We have passion for building strategies, solutions, and creative products to help our clients solve their most complex and interesting business problems. We surround our technologists with interesting challenges, innovative minds, and emerging technologies.

Slalom's Global AI capability focuses on next-level AI and Machine Learning solutions for clients. You'll join a diverse team of engineers, data scientists, and AI thought leaders. We work across modern AI platforms, develop novel AI solutions, and work with our technology partners to push their products into the future.

Slalom is targeting Consultant or Sr. Consultant level candidates for this role.

What You’ll Do
• Provide support from sales through delivery, understanding our clients' business challenges, and suggesting robust AI/ML solutions.
• Apply Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and other relevant technologies to assist in building AI tools that solve real business problems.
• Assist in the design, development, presentation, and delivery of traditional ML solutions in areas such as Computer Vision, NLP, Recommendation Systems, etc.
• Stay updated on fundamental AI/ML concepts and emerging trends to contribute to solution discussions and development.
• Support the team in creating pricing strategies, go-to-market plans, and identifying potential partnerships to promote AI/ML adoption.
• Contribute to the growth of the AI/ML community within the organization through learning, mentoring, and sharing knowledge.

What You’ll Bring
• Strong consultative and communication skills, and the ability to convey complex technical concepts to diverse stakeholders.
• Solid technical foundation, combined with constant curiosity to stay on the creative edge of ML/AI solutions.
• Technical and conversational fluency in AI, GenAI, Machine Learning and at least one of the major clouds (AWS, GCP, Azure)
• Hands-on experience with RAG, agentic workflows, fine tuning, or other LLM-based techniques.
• Experience putting ML/AI into production, and ability to talk through best practices and pitfalls.
• Understanding of validation frameworks for AI and ML tools, with knowledge of the production-ready offerings on the market for AI validation.
• Excellent python, especially for ML/AI use cases.
• Software engineering and/or application development background, especially in one of the major clouds.
• Nice to have:
• Experience in a sales support role, within Data Science, Machine Learning, or AI.
• Familiarity with leading data platforms like Databricks and Snowflake, and their basic services.
• Experience implementing MLOps best practices and ML workflow tools, and the ability to translate this experience to creative LLMOps solutions.

About Us

Slalom is a purpose-led, global business and technology consulting company. From strategy to implementation, our approach is fiercely human. In six countries and 43 markets, we deeply understand our customers—and their customers—to deliver practical, end-to-end solutions that drive meaningful impact. Backed by close partnerships with over 400 leading technology providers, our 13,000+ strong team helps people and organizations dream bigger, move faster, and build better tomorrows for all. We’re honored to be consistently recognized as a great place to work, including being one of Fortune’s 100 Best Companies to Work For seven years running. Learn more at slalom.com.

Compensation And Benefits

Slalom prides itself on helping team members thrive in their work and life. As a result, Slalom is proud to invest in benefits that include meaningful time off and paid holidays, parental leave, 401(k) with a match, a range of choices for highly subsidized health, dental, & vision coverage, adoption and fertility assistance, and short/long-term disability. We also offer yearly $350 reimbursement account for any well-being-related expenses, as well as discounted home, auto, and pet insurance.

Slalom is committed to fair and equitable compensation practices. For this position at the Consultant level the base salary pay range is $96,000 to $177,000. For this position at the Senior Consultant level the base salary pay range is $110,000 to $203,000. In addition, individuals may be eligible for an annual discretionary bonus. Actual compensation will depend upon an individual’s skills, experience, qualifications, location, and other relevant factors. The salary pay range is subject to change and may be modified at any time.

EEO and Accommodations

Slalom is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to inclusion, diversity, and equity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. Slalom will also consider qualified applications with criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. Slalom welcomes and encourages applications from individuals with disabilities. Reasonable accommodations are available for candidates during all aspects of the selection process. Please advise the talent acquisition team if you require accommodations during the interview process.

We will accept candidate until 10/20/2024.

Job Description

We've built a team of creators, innovators, entrepreneurs, and leaders to unlock endless possibility for our customers and partners with the power of OCI. We are now seeking an excellent AI Field Cloud Sales Representative to identify, progress, and close business within our Artificial Intelligence vertical.

• Solid understanding of NVIDIA GPUs and GPU applications

job_title: Sr. Mgr. AI Consulting, Lockheed AI Center (LAIC)
job_description:
When it comes to using cutting-edge machine learning to tackle complex problems, Lockheed Martin is driven by a singular mission focus and desire to continuously innovate. Today’s challenges to global security aren’t just changing – they’re accelerating faster than ever before. Through our dedication to our mission, our AI-enabled systems are changing the way militaries operate and protect their forces, the way first responders fight fires, and how researchers explore the far reaches of space and the ocean’s depths.

The Lockheed Martin Artificial Intelligence Center (LAIC) team is looking for a high-energy, experienced leader with technical expertise in artificial intelligence and machine learning to lead and expand the AI Consulting team within the AI Foundations directorate. This role involves working alongside a diverse team of data engineers, AI/ML developers, full stack developers, MLOps teams, and product managers.

As The Successful Candidate, You Will
• Lead the AI Consulting team during a significant growth phase, providing support for all Lockheed Martin business areas, digital transformation (1LMX), and external consulting engagements.
• Set the strategy and vision for the AI Consulting team, overseeing day-to-day leadership, designing complex solutions, and addressing intricate AI/ML challenges for Lockheed Martin business areas and external customers.

job_title: Senior Director, Generative AI Product Strategy & Operations
job_description:
The job profile for this position is Product Strategy Senior Director, which is a Band 5 Management Career Track Role.

Excited to grow your career?

We value our talented employees, and whenever possible strive to help one of our associates grow professionally before recruiting new talent to our open positions. If you think the open position you see is right for you, we encourage you to apply!

Our people make all the difference in our success.

Senior Director, Generative AI Product Strategy & Operations

At Cigna, we're on a mission to improve the health, well-being, and peace of mind of those we serve. We're not just a health services company; we're innovators, dreamers, and doers who believe in the power of data and technology to transform lives. We're building a future where healthcare is personalized, proactive, and accessible. And now, we're venturing into the exciting realm of Generative AI to revolutionize how we serve our customers and run our business.

Why we need you

Imagine a world where AI doesn't just crunch numbers but is deployed to solve complex health challenges in ways we've never seen before. That's the future we're building at Cigna and we're at a pivotal moment in our journey. Generative AI has the potential to redefine healthcare as we know it - from personalized digital engagement to streamlined operations. But potential alone isn't enough. We need someone who can turn this potential into reality, someone who can navigate the complex landscape of healthcare and AI to create solutions that truly make a difference.

You're not just filling a role; you're shaping the future of healthcare. Your experience as an AI product leader and strategic vision will be the catalyst that propels Cigna to the forefront of AI in healthcare. Without you, we risk falling behind in a rapidly evolving field. With you, we have the chance to set new standards in healthcare innovation and improve millions of lives.

This isn't just about implementing new technology. It's about reimagining what's possible in healthcare by asking "what if" and then making it happen. Are you ready to lead this transformation?

Here's what you'll be doing

You'll build and lead extraordinary teams of AI experts, fostering a culture where creativity and technical excellence thrive. Your days will be filled with strategic thinking, collaborative problem-solving, and hands-on leadership:
• Craft and execute a visionary strategy that positions Cigna as a leader in Generative AI applications in healthcare
• Build and nurture a team of rockstars who are as passionate about innovation as you are
• Collaborate with leaders across Cigna to identify game-changing opportunities and bring them to life
• Evolve the operating model for developing, deploying, and delivering business value with Generative AI applications, while ensuring we lead with integrity and responsibility
• Orchestrate scaling of Generative AI initiatives across digital, analytics, and enterprise service operations, while developing foundational capabilities that are reusable and extensible

You need these qualifications
• You've successfully led AI or advanced analytics initiatives that have transformed business operations or created new product lines
• You have a proven track record of building and leading high-performing teams in fast-paced, innovative environments
• You possess a deep understanding of Generative AI technologies and their practical applications in business and healthcare
• You're a master communicator, equally comfortable discussing complex AI concepts with technical teams and explaining the business value of AI to C-suite executives
• You have experience managing substantial budgets and delivering ROI on technology investments

It would be nice if
• You have experience applying AI in healthcare or other highly regulated industries
• You've been part of a team that has successfully commercialized AI products or services
• You have a network of connections in the AI research community and stay abreast of cutting-edge developments
• You have hands-on experience with popular AI frameworks and tools

Equal opportunity employment

There's one more, very important thing. We are an equal opportunity employer. We search for amazing people of diverse backgrounds, experiences, abilities, and perspectives. We take care of each other to create an inclusive work environment where we love to come to work every day. We'd be happy to provide reasonable accommodations to help you apply. We hope you can join us.

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

For this position, we anticipate offering an annual salary of 178,100 - 296,900 USD / yearly, depending on relevant factors, including experience and geographic location.

This role is also anticipated to be eligible to participate in an annual bonus plan and long term incentive plan.

We want you to be healthy, balanced, and feel secure. That’s why you’ll enjoy a comprehensive range of benefits, with a focus on supporting your whole health. Starting on day one of your employment, you’ll be offered several health-related benefits including medical, vision, dental, and well-being and behavioral health programs. We also offer 401(k) with company match, company paid life insurance, tuition reimbursement, a minimum of 18 days of paid time off per year and paid holidays. For more details on our employee benefits programs, visit Life at Cigna.

job_description:
As Senior Engineering Manager for the Marketing AI and SMS Sales Teams at Postscript, you will lead highly skilled product engineers that bring our AI experiences to life for marketers in collaboration with our AI/ML engineering team. Engineering Managers are directly responsible for day-to-day people management of their direct reports. They focus on leadership, people management, and delivery/execution duties. This team in particular is focused on our new AI messaging products. Our backend, primarily Python within an AWS architecture, is evolving to meet scalability and complexity demands. Your team will be responsible for building the product experiences necessary to ensure AI is adopted. You will also be exposed to AI tools and techniques in partnership with our AI/ML team.

The ideal candidate has multiple years of experience leading both IC engineers at their career pinnacle and managers of smaller engineering teams. Additionally, the ideal candidate has a passion for AI, product engineering and delivering great work that drives business value and improves the customer experience. The best candidates possess the ability to perform the duties of a lead engineer, project manager, and people manager on any given day and know when and how to switch between those hats as needed to achieve success for their team(s) and the overall company.

Primary duties
• Lead two teams of engineers that are enabling the steel threads of our first AI products
• Collaborate with AI engineering teammates (and their leader), product managers, business stakeholders, designers, and others to plan and execute work
• Carry out performance management duties for your direct reports via just in time feedback, 1:1s, annual reviews, and continuous improvement opportunities
• Consistently provide ongoing technical mentorship and general professional development for your direct reports and other engineers at Postscript

• Recruit and hire engineers on your team and on other teams, raise and advocate new positions on your team, and directly participate in the screening and evaluation of candidates

• Experience working with AI technologies (predictive and generative)

Quanta Technology is an independent technology, consulting, and testing company providing business and technical expertise, along with advanced methodologies and processes, to utilities and others in the power and energy industries. Our mission is to provide unparalleled value to our clients in every engagement across the value chain by using advanced software and hardware, laboratories, and custom tools for a holistic approach to practical service and the most insightful thought leadership in the industry.

Quanta Technology has been leading the development of Augmented Intelligence solutions specifically designed to enhance reliability and resilience in the power system industry. Our Augmented Intelligence environments are capable of solving extremely complex electric grid performance problems while ensuring compliance with power flow laws. We are focused on creating an environment committed to employee growth, achieved by ensuring a quality workspace, allowing flexible schedules, and through our training & mentoring programs. Quanta Technology is committed to an equal-opportunity workplace.

POSITION OVERVIEW

As a Senior Advisor specializing in AI Applications in Power System Studies at Quanta Technology, you will be at the forefront of integrating cutting-edge AI technologies into power system reliability and resilience planning. This senior role is ideal for a high-performing individual with hands-on experience in AI solution architecture, particularly in the Generative AI (GAI) domain. You will lead a team of experts, manage complex projects, and drive innovation in the industry.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Technical Leadership:
• Lead AI-driven power system studies focusing on reliability and resilience planning.
• Develop and implement advanced AI solutions, especially in the GAI domain, to solve complex industry challenges.
• Provide high-quality technical content for projects efficiently and timely.
• Stay abreast of the latest technical developments and integrate them into projects.

Project Management & Proposal Development:
• Write compelling proposals to secure new projects.
• Apply and further develop project management skills to ensure successful project execution.
• Leverage Quanta Technology’s synergies and resources to enhance project outcomes.

Client Engagement & Business Development:
• Build and maintain strategic relationships with clients at various organizational levels.
• Identify and develop revenue-generating opportunities.
• Present Quanta Technology’s competencies and offerings to customers, establishing yourself as a trusted expert in AI applications for power systems.

Team Collaboration & Mentorship:
• Lead and mentor a team of advisors and engineers, fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment.
• Promote overall Quanta Technology values and vision within the team.
• Develop and maintain contacts to generate new project opportunities.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS

EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE
• Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering or a relevant technical field.
• Minimum of 8 years of experience with demonstrated success in technical leadership, specifically in AI applications for power systems; at least 2 years in cutting edge GAI.
• Proven track record in AI solution architecture, with a strong emphasis on the GAI domain.

SKILLS & SYSTEMS
• Strong technical expertise in the utility industry, supported by project experience, peer-reviewed publications, leadership in technical societies, and/or patents.
• Exceptional ability to work in a diverse and inclusive space and within a dynamic team environment.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE
• PhD in Electrical Engineering or a relevant technical field.
• Additional relevant certifications or continued education that enhance success in the role.

LOCATION

Quanta Technology has offices in Raleigh, NC, Markham, ON, Lombard, IL, Concord, CA, and San Clemente, CA. We offer hybrid employment that supports a blend of in-office and remote work.

WORKING CONDITIONS

Working conditions are normal for a professional office environment. Work may require overnight national and international travel.

job_description:
The AI-supported posture analysis project we will develop for Holistic Health 360 Degree Health Services is a system that will help detect posture disorders by analyzing people's posture and suggest corrective measures. The main goal of the project is to contribute to a healthier life by improving users' posture.

Features and Functions of the Project

-Stance Analysis

The person using the app can analyze their posture by uploading photos to the app. Artificial intelligence algorithms process these images to identify posture points and determine whether the posture is correct. As a result of the analysis, it is determined whether there is any disorder in the user's posture.

- Visual and Textual Feedback

Users are visually shown posture analysis results.

Posture disorders are indicated graphically and detailed textual feedback is provided.

Users are given suggestions on how to correct their posture.

- Suggestions and Exercises

AI recommends personalized exercises to help users improve their posture. These exercises include specific movements aimed at correcting the user's posture disorders.

- Per User Profile and Tracking

A profile must be created in the app for the user whose photo is uploaded. Posture analysis results and recommendations are saved in the user profile. Users can track their past analysis results and progress.

- Mobile Application & Tablet

The project is designed to work on mobile and tablet platforms. Users can analyze downtime and get feedback from any platform they want.

- Purpose of the Project

1 - Detection of Posture Disorders: Detecting users' posture disorders at an early stage.

2 - Health Improvement: Enabling users to correct their posture and lead a healthier life.

3 - Personalized Support: Providing personalized exercises and recommendations based on users' needs.

- How does it work?

1 - Image Upload: The user uploads a photo of their posture to the app.

2 - Artificial Intelligence Analysis: The uploaded images are analyzed by artificial intelligence algorithms. These algorithms identify posture points and detect posture disorders.

3 - Feedback and Recommendations: The user is presented with posture analysis results and corrective suggestions. With visual and textual feedback, the user learns how to correct their posture.

4 - Progress Tracking: The user can track past analysis results and progress on their profile. In this way, they can see how they have improved their posture over time.

We have a case study on the project. I can send it if anyone is interested.

Join Us In Building a Transformative Research Knowledge Reasoning Platform Based On State-of-the-art Large Language & Vision Models (LLMs). Our Agile And Independent Team Is On a Mission To Revolutionize & Democratize Data Analysis And Research Insight By Transforming Complex, Time-consuming Text Reasoning Tasks Into Efficient And Trustable Processes. You'll Help Us Build a Next Generation Platform

As a Full Stack & AI Engineer – Software Engineer II, you will be instrumental in shaping our engineering vision by developing and executing reliable and transparent research knowledge reasoning processes. This involves defining and building reasoning operations, creating novel data structures, and designing high-level reasoning programs. You will fine-tune large language models (LLMs) based on these reasoning programs to develop advanced planning agents. Additionally, you will build and deploy large-scale indexes using NoSQL, Graph, and ML Vector databases to store and track both human-authored and LLM-generated research insights. You'll also implement innovative user interfaces that blend chat agents with interactive data displays, integrated with Microsoft Graph and various application plugins. This will enhance user experiences across Microsoft Copilot, Teams & Office apps, Figma, and engineering tools, transforming how organizations conduct research and make data-driven decisions.

Additionally, you will develop and refine the full-stack infrastructure of our platform, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and adherence to security, privacy, and AI best practices.

This opportunity will enable you to accelerate your career growth by working with cutting-edge AI, machine learning technologies, and novel data structures. You will develop a breadth of expertise in full-stack development, from designing robust backend systems to creating intuitive frontend interfaces. Additionally, you will contribute to a transformative platform that redefines how organizations conduct and discover research, make data-driven decisions, and enhance the reliability and transparency of research insights across various industries.

Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.

Responsibilities
• Collaborate closely with project managers, researchers, architects, and technical leads to understand and refine user requirements for research knowledge systems. Incorporate customer feedback into future designs and solutions.
• Contribute to product architecture processes, ensuring system security and compliance while refining code plans.
• Contribute to architecture discussions, design and implementation of scalable AI systems for data analysis, storage, and retrieval. Develop comprehensive design documents.
• Develop, optimize, and review code to ensure extensibility, maintainability, and adherence to best practices.
• Maintain live service operations on call, monitoring system performance and addressing issues promptly.
• Contribute to engineering excellence, improving developer tools, ensuring compliance, and staying updated on industry developments.
• Embody our Culture and Values.

Qualifications

Required Qualifications:
• Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related technical field AND 2+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, or Python
• OR equivalent experience.
• Industry experience in building, shipping, and running live sites for cloud hosted web apps and services.

Other Requirements
• Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role. These requirements include, but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings: 
• Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud Background Check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.

Preferred Qualifications
• 2+ years of experience in building and shipping web applications.  
• 2+ years of experience running live sites for web apps and services.
• Demonstrated familiarity with modern web technologies such as React, TypeScript, and GraphQL.
• Experience with graph databases and NoSQL.
• Experience building LLM/ML powered systems.
• Experience deploying, handling, and scaling infrastructure on Microsoft Azure platform.

Software Engineering IC3 - The typical base pay range for this role across the U.S. is USD $98,300 - $193,200 per year. There is a different range applicable to specific work locations, within the San Francisco Bay area and New York City metropolitan area, and the base pay range for this role in those locations is USD $127,200 - $208,800 per year.

job_description:
Job Title: Sr. AI/ML Engineer

Location: Dallas, TX/ Irving, TX/ Boston, MA/ Wellesley, MA/ NYC, NY, Hartford, CT/ Blue Bell, PA/ Woonsocket, RI/ Scottsdale, AZ (Hybrid)

Work Type: Full Time

Job Description:-

As a Sr./Lead ML/AI Engineer, you will drive the design and implementation of functionality related to the end-to-end ML/AI and Feature lifecycle management on Azure/Google Cloud Platform, leveraging and integrating the cloud native services with other standard operational and automation tools.

Key responsibilities include:

• Support the deployment of ML/AI pipelines on the platform.

• Enable functionality to support analysis, model optimization, statistical testing, model versioning, deployment and monitoring of model and data.

• Ability to translate functionality into scalable, tested, and configurable platform architecture and software.

• Establish strong software engineering principles for development in Python on the Azure/Google Cloud Platform.

• Deliver features aligned to enterprise AutoML, Feature Engineering, and MLOPS capability.

• Innovative thinking and great communication skills.

• Strong ownership of deliverables, with design decisions aligned to scale and industry best practices.

• Provide technical leadership and mentorship to a team of machine learning engineers. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align ML initiatives with overall business goals.

• Design, implement, and optimize machine learning algorithms and models. Stay abreast of the latest advancements in ML research and apply them to solve complex business problems.

• Architect and implement scalable and efficient machine learning systems. Collaborate with software engineers to integrate ML models into production systems.

• Work closely with data engineers to ensure the availability and quality of data for training and evaluation of machine learning models.

• Develop strategies for deploying machine learning models at scale. Ensure models are integrated into production systems with high reliability and performance.

• Design and conduct experiments to evaluate the performance of machine learning models. Iterate on models based on feedback and evolving business requirements.

Required Qualifications:

• 6+ years of experience in analytics domains, and deep understanding of ML operationalization and lifecycle management.

• 5+ years of deploying and monitoring analytical assets in batch/real-time business processes.

• 5+ years of SQL & Python programming experience leveraging strong software development principles.

• Experience in designing and developing AI applications and systems.

• Experience with real-time and streaming technology (i.e. Azure Event Hubs, Azure Functions, Pub/Sub, Kafka, Spark Streaming etc.)

• Experience with REST API/Microservice development using Python/Java.

• Experience with deployment/scaling of apps on containerized environment (AKS and/or GKE)

• Experience with Snowflake/Big Query, Google Dataproc/Databricks or any big data frameworks on Spark

• Experience with RDBMS and NoSQL Databases and hands-on query tuning/optimization.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Hands on experience in building solutions using cloud native services (Azure, GCP preferred)

• Understanding of DevOps, Infrastructure as Code, automation for self service

Education:

• Required: bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, Statistics, Physics, Math, or related field or equivalent experience

• Preferred: Master’s degree or PhD with coursework focused on advanced algorithms, mathematics in computing, data structures, etc.

job_description:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. In this role, you will become an AI Content Editor, assessing the quality of AI-generated writing, reviewing the work of fellow writers, and crafting original responses to prompts in order to teach the model what truly excellent writing looks like.

While we will be selective in terms of writing ability, we are actively recruiting for this role and encourage you to apply if you feel you would be a good fit. More questions? You'll have an opportunity to speak with a member of our team during your onboarding.

Highlights:
• Flexible work schedule:
Work whenever and wherever you want
• Weekly payouts:
Automatically receive timely payments (no invoicing!)
• Unlock opportunities:
Gain experience in the field that will dominate the next decade and beyond

What you'll be doing:
• Rating the quality of AI-generated writing on rubrics such as factuality, completeness, brevity, and grammatical correctness
• Reviewing the work of fellow human writers
• Responding to prompts with top-tier original writing

Requirements:
• Currently enrolled in or completed an Associates' degree or higher from an accredited institution
• A strong sense of writing style paired with exceptional English-language spelling and grammar
• A critical eye and the ability to clearly explain the strengths and weaknesses of a given piece of text
• This opportunity is currently open to people who live in the following countries:

About Us

Zynga is a leading developer of the world's most popular social games that are played by millions of people around the world each day. Since our founding in 2007, our mission has been to connect the world through games and delight consumers with social gaming experiences.

OUR TEAM

Zynga’s Applied AI group focuses on developing innovative ways to tackle problems within the game development process, demonstrating directly the ways that AI can improve the creativity and efficiency of team members across Zynga. Our team is multi-disciplinary, and includes Engineers, Data Scientists and Product Managers among others. We provide tools, technologies and expertise to all of Zynga to improve all aspects of development with groundbreaking AI. Come join the Applied AI team at Zynga and make an impact across all of the company’s games!

We’re looking for an adept AI Business Partner that understands how to navigate the constantly evolving world of AI who can work with us to evaluate potential vendors, and help us to quantify how these technologies are impacting teams across Zynga. This is a new role in the AI landscape that combines elements of customer relations, vendor management and user research to ensure we're using AI in the best – and most appropriate – ways.

KEY ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Contribute to evaluations of AI vendors for fitness, ethics, security and legality, in collaboration with the wider compliance and governance team.
• Be responsible for onboarding and sunsetting AI tools vendors.
• Raise issues and features requests to our vendors.
• Assist the team in AI governance and compliance of third-party providers by working with Legal and other partners, including maintaining the status of each vendor, tracking issues, coordinating meetings, and reporting to management.
• Understand the impact of AI tools. Foster strong relationships and open communication across teams to educate our customers and share best practices.
• Expedite across dependencies such as Legal, Security or Procurement to reduce delays in getting tools into the hands of our customers.
• Coordinate closely with other fields (especially Production and Product Management) to ensure alignment against Applied AI and Zynga's goals.

Desired Skills And Experience
• Understanding and knowledge of AI applications and methods
• Experience using or building AI
• Experience in project management
• Experience managing relationships with third party vendors
• Strong communication and analytical skills
• Ability to manage workload and consistently achieve delivery timelines
• Ability to work independently with minimal direction, as a part of a wider team
• Ability to challenge and influence in a collaborative way

job_description:
We are seeking an experienced AI Trainer to use AI as a tool to effectively study and replicate particular writing styles, tonalities, vocabularies, and everything else required to mimic specific writers. The goal is for the AI to write new scripts that closely mirror the unique characteristics of our existing catalog of scripts from various writers.

Responsibilities:

- Analyze and understand the writing styles of existing scripts.

- Train the AI to study existing scripts and extract essential features that define the writer’s style.

- Develop models and algorithms that enable the AI to replicate the specific writing style in new scripts.

- Continuously refine and improve the AI’s writing capabilities based on feedback and performance.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in AI training and development, particularly in the field of creative writing.

- Strong understanding of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques.

- Ability to analyze and deconstruct writing styles to identify key characteristics and features.

- Experience with training models to replicate specific writing styles.

This will be a long term project for the right candidate with the opportunity to consistently work across multiple large YouTube channels. We look forward to working with you. Good luck.

Job description Based in Montreal and Toronto, Deeplite is an AI software company dedicated to enabling AI for everyday life. Deeplite uses AI to automatically make other AI models faster, smaller and more energy efficient creating highly compact, high-performance deep neural networks for deployment on edge devices such as cameras, sensors, drones, phones and vehicles. Deeplite was named to the 2020 CB Insights AI100 list of top 100 privately held AI companies and has been featured by Gartner, Forbes, and ARM AI as a premier Edge AI innovator. At Deeplite, we are tackling inference optimization of deep neural networks, making them faster and energy-efficient from cloud to edge computing. Our solution leverages state-of-the-art technology from elite universities to make deep neural networks applicable for any device, and our team works hard on the iterative evolution of the science behind deep neural networks to directly improve daily life. Our team is growing and we're looking to hire a Full-Time Deep Learning Engineer. Here's what you'll be doing:
Our platform is in the development phase, and we're implementing academic works and our patent portfolio into our technology. In this role, you will be immersed in core concepts of deep neural networks and their low-level implementations, closely follow academic works in the field of deep learning and collaborate and increase productivity on existing research projects. Job requirements Here's what we need you to bring to the table:
Post-secondary education in a related field. Strong working knowledge of deep learning, and experience utilizing theoretical and empirical research to solve real-world problems. Must have at least 1 year of experience with Deep Learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow. Must have at least 3 years of industry experience with C/C++, Python coding or other high-level languages. Experience building systems based on machine learning and/or deep learning. Job Description

Oracle has formed a new organization - Oracle Health Applications & Infrastructure (OHAI), dedicated to product strategy and development for improvement of healthcare using modern cloud native technology build on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).

One of the focus areas of OHAI is to modernize, improve and reimagine Millennium healthcare platform using AI/ML, specifically generative AI.

Millennium applications team in OHAI is responsible for reimagining, conceiving, and enhancing clinical applications using OCI’s cloud native AI/ML infrastructure for patients and clinicians.

Why?Oracle Health Applications & Infrastructure is a new line of business that aims to leverage our expertise in IaaS and SaaS to transform the health care industry, provide patient-centric care and make the best clinical tools available around the world ( https://www.oracle.com/industries/healthcare/ ). We are looking for the best and brightest technologists as we build the next generation of Health platform that will change the industry. This is a greenfield effort with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes energetic and creative environment. We like to move fast and innovate, and we want your help to make it a world class engineering team that makes a large impact.

Millennium application team is using generative AI and other AI/ML capabilities such as semantic search and RAG, voice assisted navigation and dictation, text generation, summation to develop next generation of health care clinical applications using cloud native AI services to provide superior patient and clinician experience. Our platform strives to provides consistent customer experience across applications while providing mission critical functions ranging from patient prescriptions to surgery rooms to our customers across the globe. We are expanding our talented team so come join us while we embark on this exciting journey.

What?We are seeking hands-on Senior Member of Technical Staff Engineers that share our passion and excitement of operating distributed systems at hyper scale using cloud native best practices. You will have part in the disruption of the health care industry and will help deliver better patient care. As a SMTS engineer in our team, you’ll be responsible and lead efforts in designing and building scalable, distributed, and resilient software components and services to build ML platform, data pipelines, search infrastructure and clinical applications. We believe in ownership and expect you to think long term, mentor, and empower other engineers. As a tech lead you will Proven complete SDLC from architecture, development, testing, first class monitoring, to production.

Minimum Qualifications
• BS or MS degree in computer science, or equivalent
• 6+ years of developing and shipping enterprise distributed and/or cloud native systems
• Strong grasp of system design fundamentals and distributed systems architectural best practices
• Proven ability to write code in Java, Python, or similar OO languages.
• Experience with web application development using microservices frameworks such as Helidon, DropWizard, Spring, etc. Experience with building data pipelines, messaging and, scalable streaming services preferred.
• Experience with containers and container orchestration technologies (Kubernetes, Docker)
• Strong desire to make an impact and thrive in collaborative and energetic environment.
• Experience with Cloud Engineering Infrastructure Development
• Ability to effectively communicate technical concepts verbally and through design.
• Experience with deploying ML models and monitoring tools is desirable.

Career Level - IC4

As a member of the software engineering division, you will take an active role in the definition and evolution of standard practices and procedures. You will be responsible for defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, designing and debugging of software applications or operating systems.

job_title: Yelp Auto Responding Bot Using AI - Contract to Hire
job_description:
We're seeking a skilled developer to create an automated response system for our Yelp business messages. The ideal candidate will have experience with email automation, API integrations, and a strong understanding of email protocols and headers.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop a bot that can automatically respond to Yelp messages received via email.

Integrate the bot with our existing email system (Gmail).

Ensure the bot's responses appear as if they're coming from a standard email client to bypass Yelp's automated message restrictions.

Implement security measures to protect sensitive business and customer data.

Create a user-friendly interface for managing and customizing automated responses.

Provide documentation and training for using the bot.

Workflow for the Yelp Message Response Bot:

Email Monitoring:

Set up a system to monitor the designated email inbox for new messages from Yelp.

Implement filters to identify Yelp messages accurately.

Message Processing:

Extract relevant information from the incoming Yelp message (customer name, inquiry details, etc.).

Categorize the message based on its content (e.g., pricing inquiry, availability check, general question).

Response Generation:

Create a database of pre-written response templates for different categories of inquiries.

Implement a system to select the appropriate response template based on the message category.

Use natural language processing techniques to personalize the response with the customer's name and specific details from their inquiry.

Email Composition:

Construct the email response using the selected template and personalized information.

Set appropriate email headers to mimic a standard email client (as previously discussed).

Sending the Response:

Integrate with an email sending service (e.g., Gmail API, SendGrid) to send the response.

Ensure the email is sent with the correct "From" address and appears to come from a legitimate email client.

Logging and Monitoring:

Implement a logging system to track all incoming messages and sent responses.

Create alerts for any failed responses or unusual activity.

User Interface:

Develop a simple dashboard for managing the bot, including:

Viewing recent messages and responses

Editing response templates

Setting up custom rules for certain types of inquiries

Manually intervening when needed

Testing and Refinement:

Conduct thorough testing to ensure the bot responds correctly to various types of inquiries.

Implement a feedback loop to continuously improve response accuracy and quality.

Compliance and Security:

Ensure the system complies with relevant data protection regulations.

Implement security measures to protect customer data and prevent unauthorized access.

Maintenance and Updates:

Set up a system for regular maintenance and updates to keep the bot functioning optimally.

Plan for periodic reviews of the bot's performance and effectiveness.

job_description:
Backend Software Engineer / Distributed Systems

Distributed ML Training

Location: Fully Remote

Type: Full-time

Join an innovative Series A Deep Tech company at the forefront of AI and blockchain technology! Backed by top investors with over $50 million in funding, our client is a team of 20 industry experts, looking to grow to 35. They are leveraging blockchain to provide globally accessible computing resources for AI platforms and are seeking world-class engineers to accelerate AI progress. This is a fully remote role offering a high level of autonomy.

Responsibilities:
• ML Orchestration System Design: Develop systems for orchestrating ML execution across decentralized and heterogeneous infrastructure.
• Performance Optimization: Profile and optimize training algorithms continually.
• Implement Novel Research: Build new mechanisms and algorithms to solve unprecedented problems.
• Engineering Support: Collaborate on broader ML issues, such as reproducible training.
• Technical Writing and Engagement: Contribute to technical reports and papers, and engage with the community.

Minimum Requirements:
• Distributed Foundation Model Training: Experience designing or working with training systems on large clusters.
• Networking Proficiency: Understanding and troubleshooting experience with IP, TCP, UDP, HTTP, and communication backends like NCCL, GLOO, and MPI.
• Open Source Contributions: Experience with large open-source codebases as a maintainer or trusted contributor.
• Rust Enthusiasm: Willingness to learn Rust to work across the codebase.
• Computer Science Background: Solid understanding of computational complexity and broad knowledge of algorithms and data structures.
• Self-motivation and Communication: Highly self-motivated with excellent verbal and written communication skills.
• Applied Research Comfort: Comfortable working in a high-autonomy, unpredictable applied research environment.

Bonus Skills:
• Rust Expertise: Strong experience with systems programming in Rust, understanding lifetimes, and the purpose of Pin.
• Research Experience: Published research in distributed systems or ML domains.
• Blockchain Knowledge: Understanding of blockchain fundamentals.

Be part of a team dedicated to democratizing AI, where you can leverage your expertise in distributed ML training, networking, and open-source contributions to make a significant impact. job_description:
I am looking for a developer who can build me a SaaS app that will transform AI-generated text into undetectable AI text.

The app should include three modules: AI Humanizer, AI Detector, and AI Writer.

AI Humanizer: This module will convert AI-generated text to undetectable AI text that can bypass AI detectors like Originality AI, Undetectable AI, GPTZero, ZeroGPT, and Turnitin. It would also ensure that the transformed text maintains the original meaning and context while appearing human-written.

AI Detector: This module will detect if the text given by the user is AI generated or not.

AI Generator: This module will be used by user to produce high-quality, undetectable AI-generated content, such as essays and articles.

phrasly.ai

job_description:
We are seeking a talented individual to create a simple and user-friendly dashboard that will allow us to plug-in various external databases and run AI-enabled analyses to identify the best investment opportunities in agricultural real estate . The dashboard will allow someone to run a simple query such as "Show me all of the properties located in states with an average temperature of 70F, with annual rainfall levels of 40 inches or more and where land prices have increased at least 5% per year over the past 5 years." Ideally, if we have all of the relevant database plug-ins, the dashboard will be able to quickly display results with these characteristics by analyzing the various fields in the databases we plug into the dashboard.

Skills required:

- Dashboard design

- Experience working with AI platforms that can analyze external database plug-ins

This is a small project with an expected duration of less than two weeks. If you have a strong background in AI and data analysis, and can create a dashboard that allows us to plug a variety of databases (either via URLs or directly through Google or Excel spreadsheets), I would love to work with you. This is a project that will likely continue beyond this initial scope once we understand the basic model works.

job_description:
Why WWT?

At World Wide Technology, we work together to make a new world happen. Our important work benefits our clients and partners as much as it does our people and communities across the globe. WWT is dedicated to achieving its mission of creating a profitable growth company that is also a Great Place to Work for All. We achieve this through our world-class culture, generous benefits and by delivering cutting-edge technology solutions for our clients.

WWT was founded in 1990 in St. Louis, Missouri. We employ more than 10,000 people globally and closed nearly $20 billion in revenue in 2023. We have an inclusive culture and believe our core values are the key to company and employee success. WWT is proud to have been included on the FORTUNE "100 Best Places to Work For®" list 13 years in a row!

Want to work with highly motivated individuals on high-performance teams? Join WWT today!

What is the Solutions Consulting & Engineering (SC&E) Team and why join?

Solutions Consulting & Engineering is an organization that is Customer Focused and Solutions Led. We deliver end-to-end and emerging solutions to drive customer satisfaction, increase profitability and growth. Our success is enabled by our world-class management consulting, delivery excellence and engineering brilliance. Our goal is to bring together business acumen with full-stack technical know-how to develop innovative solutions for our clients' most complex challenges.

What will you be doing?

The Senior AI Security Consultant will assist in delivering outcomes across a wide range of global clients. This will be accomplished by supporting engagements through engaging customer leadership to define priorities and outcomes and expanding the capabilities and offerings of the practice. The Consultant will collaborate on consulting engagements in the development of AI cybersecurity strategy, plan, design, and implementation. Candidates should have familiarity with both enterprise cyber security, scaled data/AI model types, and architectures.

 

Key Responsibilities:

Customer Focus:
• Understand customer needs and design solutions that address these needs both short and long-term.
• Assist in comprehensive AI security assessments of client infrastructure, identifying vulnerabilities and providing clear, actionable recommendations to mitigate risks.
• Provide subject matter expertise in emerging, AI threats, security and application architectural strategies in addition to modern cyber security elements (Zero trust, DevSecOps, Microservices, IAM, Authentication, RBAC, containerization, cloud, Access Controls, Networks, etc.)

Creative Solutioning:
• Develop and recommend plans to structure secure architectures, including Sec Ops AI-enabled process augmentation, systems infrastructure, and AI-enhanced security tooling.
• Understand the security interplay in the areas of application assurance, data classification, network security, and emerging IT trends and threats.
• Analyze and assess client-facing challenges, identify recommendations for solutions and define a strategy and roadmap to implement such solutions successfully.
• Develop and deliver workshops in the areas of AI cybersecurity, related compliance, and IAM to include but not be limited to security policy, process flows, workflows, entitlements, roles, and solution definitions.
• Develop reports and supporting presentations for both client and internal discussions with excellent communication skills that need to be demonstrated to internal and external teams.
• Research multiple approaches to issues with a strong analytical view on comparing options and documenting pros/cons.
• Understanding of AI security best practices, common tools and techniques, and ability to communicate AI concepts at various levels of technical understanding.
• Ability to document the process of evolution from standards to policies and controls to ensure security processes are adhered to and traceable.

Strategic Client Relationship Management:
• Use a strategic approach to managing customer interactions and data throughout the customer journey with a goal of higher business growth through better customer experiences.
• Assist the client with the design and implementation of AI security strategies tailored to specific business requirements, ensuring compliance with industry standards, regulations, and best practices.

Commercial Success:
• Builds strong customer relationships and delivers customer-centric solutions.
• Collaborate with internal and external experts, leveraging cutting edge offerings to grow our market position and offer best-in-class solutions for our clients.
• Work with other teammates to become a trusted advisor to our customers by thoroughly understanding issues and concerns, offering the best solutions, and delivering relevant answers.
• Maintain currency with the latest threats, vulnerabilities, and best practices in AI security. Attend relevant workshops, conferences, and seminars.
• Sharing best practices, lessons learned, and challenges from engagements internally to improve team and practice processes through continuous improvement and documentation.

End to End Solution Management/Delivery
• Build and maintain strong customer relationships and deliver customer-centric solutions.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement AI security strategies tailored to specific business requirements, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.

Qualifications:
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills, communicating complex topics to technical and executive audiences.
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, Information Assurance, Technology Management or related field with Master’s Degree preferred. Continuing education or degree- based coursework in Scaled Data, Analytics and AI/Data Science strongly preferred.
• Familiarity with integrated technology solutions, emerging AI-enabled tooling, technologies, and techniques and their application in a consulting environment. Awareness of tools and software commonly used in operations management
• Supporting practical data science projects or developing the architecture or infrastructure for AI or data (e.g., MLOps).
• Risk management beyond core security (data governance, data protection, acceptable use, responsible use, ethical use etc).
• Advising data scientists, ML engineers.
• Understanding of the concepts and function of DevOps, DevSecOps or MLOps.
• AI algorithms the security-related risks
• Can explain common security risks associated with GenAI including LLMs.
• Depth of experience in at least one primary industry vertical, e.g. healthcare, financials; or one practice area - e.g., HPC, cloud AI security, customer-facing use cases
• Relevant certifications that would be a plus may include:
• CISSP
• CS_AI
• Familiarity with implementing and/or auditing compliance frameworks such as:
• MITRE ATT&CK
• CSA CCM 4.x
• NIST 800-53
• Or other relevant security frameworks.
• Ability to perform concurrent tasks in complex environments under adjusting priorities.
• Ability to communicate and modify approach, language, and style to different audiences.
• Professional writing style and experience with demonstrable technical and business-related artifacts is required.
• Collaborative, with the ability to manage conflicting interests and deal with ambiguity. 
• Effective communication skills: capable of supporting presentations to convey concepts and solutions, writing effective emails, and discussing strategy with senior executives. 
• Strong teamwork qualities: able to gain the trust of customers and collaborate effectively within the WWT team. 
• Intellectually curious with a desire to understand constantly evolving technology solutions. 
• Proactive, collaborative, with emotional intelligence, and the capacity to learn and synthesize new information. 
• Adaptable, with the ability to conform to shifting priorities, demands, and timelines through analytical and problem-solving capabilities. 
• Self-directed, with the ability to adapt to change and competing demands.

Want to learn more about Consulting Services? Check us out on our platform: https://www.wwt.com/consulting-services

The well-being of WWT employees is essential. So, when it comes to our benefits package, WWT has one of the best. We offer the following benefits to all full-time employees:
• Health and Wellbeing: Heath, Dental, and Vision Care, Onsite Health Centers, Employee Assistance Program, Wellness program
• Financial Benefits: Competitive pay, Profit Sharing, 401k Plan with Company Matching, Life and Disability Insurance, Tuition Reimbursement
• Paid Time Off: PTO & Holidays, Parental Leave, Sick Leave, Military Leave, Bereavement
• Additional Perks: Nursing Mothers Benefits, Voluntary Legal, Pet Insurance, Employee Discount Program

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion is more than a commitment at WWT -- it is the foundation of what we do. Through diverse networks and pipelines, we have a clear vision: to create a Great Place to Work for All. We believe inclusion includes U. Be who U are at WWT!

Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Veterans/Individuals With Disabilities

Locations Include: MO, IL, GA, TX, FL, SC, KY, TN, KS and potentially others

job_title: Consulting Solutions Architect - AI & Security - Oklahoma
job_description:
Why WWT?

Founded in 1990, World Wide Technology (WWT), a global technology solutions provider leading the AI and Digital Revolution, with $20 billion in annual revenue, combines the power of strategy, execution and partnership to accelerate digital transformational outcomes for large public and private organizations around the world. Through its Advanced Technology Center, a collaborative ecosystem of the world's most advanced hardware and software solutions, WWT helps customers and partners conceptualize, test and validate innovative technology solutions for the best business outcomes and then deploys them at scale through its global warehousing, distribution and integration capabilities.

With nearly 10,000 employees and more than 55 locations around the world, WWT's culture, built on a set of core values and established leadership philosophies, has been recognized 13 years in a row by Fortune and Great Place to Work® for its unique blend of determination, innovation and leadership focus on diversity and inclusion. With this culture at its foundation, WWT bridges the gap between business and technology to make a new world happen for its customers, partners and communities.

Want to work with highly motivated individuals on high-performance teams? Join WWT today!

What is the Consulting Solutions Architect Team and why join?

Want to work with highly motivated individuals that come together to form high performance team? Come join WWT today! We are looking for a Consulting Solutions Architect to join our Central Region Global Enterprise Sales team.

Why should you join Global Enterprise Sales?

As a Consulting Solutions Architect (CSA), you will be partnering with Client Managers to provide the technical Pre-Sales work focused on Networking and Automation for our Enterprise customers across the Region. No two days will be the same as our broad offerings include Infrastructure Modernization, Multicloud Architecture, Security Transformation, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Digital Strategy among others. 

Our Advanced Technology Center (https://www.wwt.com/atc) changes the game for us in many ways. It enriches and transforms the way we interact with our customers in forms of ideation sessions, demos, POCs, workshops, training, briefings and more. In addition, the ATC is a world class environment which enables self-education as well as career growth.   

What will you be doing?

In this role, you will be responsible for providing Networking and Automation technical solutions to our customers and internal organizations. The CSA acts as a key resource for engaging with strategic customer relationships while also collaborating with our customer's teams and internal teams to reach successful outcomes for our client's business objectives.

The role will also collaborate with marketing and other teams to drive market data for the relevant technologies with the goal of understanding industry trends and the overall impact to WWT and our customer's business.

Job Duties and Responsibilities:
• Be a self-driven and motivated team player to help other team members and our customers overcome challenges to drive secure outcomes that transform security teams with modern approaches to risk and compliance.
• Produce tactical solutions and strategic frameworks that address security in complex customer environments.
• Make recommendations for building new infrastructure and improving existing architecture.
• Help implement and adopt new technologies for future deployment.
• Provide technical guidance, knowledge transfers and mentorship to peers as required.
• Simplify messaging and assist in vendor enablement for field sales teams.
• Create functional multi-vendor architectures and solutions.
• Engage in thought leadership activities: event speaking, blog posts, podcasts, conference attendance.
• Stay up to date on Security approaches, supporting technologies, trends, standards, and best practices.
• Help create proposals and presentations aligned with account teams and vendors.
• Learn, Understand and Evangelize WWT’s differentiators.
• Familiarize WWT account teams with Security solutions and provide practice messaging updates regularly.
• Participate in the design & buildout of labs in our ATC
• Define POC and Customer Engagement guidelines.
• Knowledge of Information Security Standards (NIST, PCI, HIPPA, etc)
• Knowledge of Cybersecurity solutions in private/public cloud -- IaaS/PaaS
• Knowledge of Cybersecurity SaaS solutions (NGEP, IAM, DLP, Email, and Web Security/VPN)
• Knowledge of designing security solutions within Containerization (Kubernetes, Docker)
• Knowledge of designing Cloud solutions using Zero-Trust framework
• Knowledge of Cloud Platforms such as MS Azure, AWS, GCP, and Oracle
• Knowledge around Microsoft Cloud Security Stack (CASB, App Gateway, Cloud Security Posture Management, Defender, Workload Protection, WAP, and Security Center)
• Knowledge of DevOps and Automation Solutions (SIEM/SOAR)

QUALIFICATIONS:

Technical Requirements:
• Enterprise-scale technical experience with network security, cloud security, hybrid infrastructures secure, architecture designs, and technology management. Required
• The technical aptitude and experience to learn new cloud security technologies and understand relevant cloud security market trends.
• Competitive Landscape: Knowledge of cloud security platforms.
• Partners: Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer need.

Preferred Skills:
• Breadth of technical security experience and knowledge, with depth / Subject Matter Expertise in two or more of the following Cloud Security Solutions. Required:
• Stateful firewall. (NG Firewall)
• WAF (Web Application Firewall)
• Data encryption and protection key services.
• SIEM, and Cloud Security Analytics
• Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR)
• Threat Intelligence
• Incident Response
• Security Operation Center
• Security as Code / Infra as code

Want to learn more about GES? Check us out on our platform: www.wwt.com

The well-being of WWT employees is essential. So, when it comes to our benefits package, WWT has one of the best. We offer the following benefits to all full-time employees:
• Health and Wellbeing: Health, Dental, and Vision Care, Onsite Health Centers, Employee Assistance Program, Wellness program
• Financial Benefits: Competitive pay, Profit Sharing, 401k Plan with Company Matching, Life and Disability Insurance, Tuition Reimbursement
• Paid Time Off: PTO & Holidays, Parental Leave, Sick Leave, Military Leave, Bereavement
• Additional Perks: Nursing Mothers Benefits, Voluntary Legal, Pet Insurance, Employee Discount Program

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion is more than a commitment at WWT -- it is the foundation of what we do. Through diverse networks and pipelines, we have a clear vision: to create a Great Place to Work for All. We believe inclusion includes U. Be who U are at WWT!

Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Veterans/Individuals With Disabilities

Locations Include: Oklahoma
